context:
Beads description:
Card footer style pagination with page number buttons. Includes previous/next navigation controls and individual page number buttons. Should support light/dark themes via Graffiti's theming system, disabled states for prev/next at boundaries, and current page indicator. Reference: Tailwind UI 'Card footer with page buttons' pattern.
